author: sidred22
title: Yambong trek ( sikkim) - 5-14 nov 2015
text: # 1 Once again, before the onset of dreary winters, a route has been charted along the contours of greater himalays, in a region besotted by desolation , astride the friendly frontiers, in the shadows of mighty Kachenjunga and yes , trusting the few who claim to have ventured, there lurks a trail traversing through the forests, rocks, rivers, ice and steel. Few call it Yambong trail others Diphoybir, but most give a damn. We ain't that creed and so at the dawn of 5th Nov, after having reverted back last time overawed by the elements, we move again. IF ANYBODY WISHES TO TAKE ON THIS MODERATE CHALLENGE ( between 5 nov- 14 nov), DO JOIN ME.
